Returns: A @B_android#webkit#WebResourceResponse_E@ containing the response information or null if the WebView should load the resource itself.
Parameters: WebResourceRequest: Object containing the details of the request.
shouldInterceptRequest(android.webkit.We.Description: Notify the host application of a resource request and allow the application to return the data. If the return value is null, the Service Worker will continue to load the resource as usual. Otherwise, the return response and data will be used.

ClassDesc: Base class for clients to capture Service Worker related callbacks, see @B_android#webkit#ServiceWorkerController_E@ for usage example.
